scripts.publish-pacakge: yarn run build && yarn publish --access public --tag latest --new-version $npm_package_version
scripts.publish-beta-pacakge: yarn run build && yarn publish --access public --tag beta --new-version $npm_package_version
scripts.tsc:rebuild: yarn run tsc:clean && yarn run tsc:build
scripts.gen-dts: npx tsc main/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --outDir types
scripts.gen-dts:docs: yarn run gen-dts && yarn run gen-docs
